seed_pair.target: I know an old man who wanted to ask for help.
seed_pair.known: Conozco a un hombre viejo que quería pedir ayuda.

S0226: el hombre | está intentando | está intentando ayudarme
the man | is trying | is trying to help me
S0227: ese hombre | va a | va a decirme | algo nuevo
that man | is going to | is going to tell me | something new
S0228: ese hombre | acaba de empezar | empezar a practicar | el habla
that man | has just started | to start to practise | speaking
S0229: esa mujer | te ayudaría | si pudiera
that woman | would help you | if she could
S0230: conozco a | un hombre joven | que quiere | trabajar contigo
I know | a young man | who wants | to work with you
